page.title: 16 RELIGION
page.content: We asked 44 people if they went to Church where would they go and, not surprisingly, 37 said St. Kenelms,Sapperton. When we questioned them more deeply we found that 6 of them{never}went to Church, 8 went regularly, 2 went less than 6 times a year. 7 said they would only go for funerals and weddings. We were sad that so few of our sample would meet Andrew Bowden, our Rector, on Sundays. Once a term the Village Primary School assist with the monthly Sunday morning Family Service and nearly all the pupils attend and many parents. The Rector takes a lesson at the School almost every week.St. Luke's Church,Frampton Mansell has recently been rededicated after being closed for a long time.Some villagers are working very hard to restore it.The Baptist Church is very well supported.
